mapper.insert: INSERT INTO binance_long_short_ratio (symbol, long_short_ratio, long_account_ratio, short_account_ratio, time_stamp) VALUES (#{symbol}, #{longShortRatio}, #{longAccountRatio}, #{shortAccountRatio}, #{timestamp}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE long_short_ratio = VALUES (long_short_ratio), long_account_ratio = VALUES (long_account_ratio), short_account_ratio = VALUES (short_account_ratio);
